response.overview: In a post-apocalyptic world, Ruby, a determined young woman, embarks on a treacherous journey west in search of her older brother Henry. Along the way, she encounters an enigmatic old woman who holds secrets of the past. As they both struggle with their own grief and memories, their paths converge, revealing a connection that transcends time and space. Together, they confront the harsh realities of their shattered world.
response.title: Along Came Ruby
